verses.verse: Now there cried<WH6817> a certain<WH259> woman<WH802> of the wives<WH4480> <WH802> of the sons<WH1121> of the prophets<WH5030> unto<WH413> Elisha,<WH477> saying,<WH559> Thy servant<WH5650> my husband<WH376> is dead;<WH4191> and thou<WH859> knowest<WH3045> that<WH3588> thy servant<WH5650> did<WH1961> fear<WH3372> <WH853> the LORD:<WH3068> and the creditor<WH5383> is come<WH935> to take<WH3947> unto him<WH853> my two<WH8147> sons<WH3206> to be bondmen.<WH5650>
